name: telugu
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C ] a member of a group of people that forms the main part of the population of the southern Indian state of Andhra Pradesh: This area of Mumbai was largely settled by Tamils and Telegus from southern India.
[ U ] the language spoken by Telugus: She replied in Telegu which, sadly, I do not speak. a Telegu-English dictionary
More examplesFewer examplesThe principal actors in Tamil films of the 1940s and the 1950s were Telugus.We are tracing the traditional roots of Telugus who migrated from their homeland centuries ago. The company announced its decision to launch local versions of its software in all 14 of India's major languages, including Hindi, Tamil, and Telugu.

relating to the Telugu people (= a people that forms the main part of the population of the southern Indian state of Andhra Pradesh) or their language: Telugu villagers the Telugu language the Telegu film "Pelli Chuskundam"
